blocks.name: cpcmp
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of all paracompact topologies.

blocks.name: df-pcmp
blocks.content: Definition of a paracompact topology. A topology is said to be paracompact iff every open cover has an open refinement that is locally finite. The definition 6 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.69. also requires the topology to be Hausdorff, but this is dropped here. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: ispcmp
blocks.content: The predicate "is a paracompact topology". (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ispcmp(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cpcmp), wcel(c0, ccref(cfv(clocfin, c0))))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cpcmp), wcel(c0, ccref(cfv(clocfin, c0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, cpcmp)
  elex(c0, ccref(cfv(clocfin, c0)))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, cpcmp, wcel(c0, ccref(cfv(clocfin, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), ccref(cfv(clocfin, cv(hs0)))))
  eleq12d(cv(hs0), ccref(cfv(clocfin, cv(hs0))), c0, ccref(cfv(clocfin, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(ccref(cfv(clocfin, cv(hs0))), ccref(cfv(clocfin, c0))), wceq(cfv(clocfin, cv(hs0)), cfv(clocfin, c0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, clocfin)
  crefeq(cfv(clocfin, cv(hs0)), cfv(clocfin, c0))
  df-pcmp(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ccref(cfv(clocfin, c0))))
}

thm ispcmp(class c0) {

  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, cpcmp, c0 ‚àà CovHasRef((LocFin ` c0)), hs0 ‚àà CovHasRef((LocFin ` hs0)))
  eleq12d(hs0, CovHasRef((LocFin ` hs0)), c0, CovHasRef((LocFin ` c0)), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  syl(hs0 = c0, CovHasRef((LocFin ` hs0))= CovHasRef((LocFin ` c0)), (LocFin ` hs0)=(LocFin ` c0))
  fveq2(hs0, c0, clocfin)

}

blocks.name: cmppcmp
blocks.content: Every compact space is paracompact. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jan-2020.)

  ex(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wbr(cv(hs1), cref, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cin(cpw(c0), cfv(clocfin, c0))), wbr(cv(hs1), cref, cv(hs0))))

  simpr(wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), csn(cv(hs3))))

blocks.name: pcmplfin
blocks.content: Given a paracompact topology ` J ` and an open cover ` U ` , there exists an open refinement ` v ` that is locally finite. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Jan-2020.)
